OOC: I'm not offended.  Empath's powers, if you care to read her bio, 
are grounded in science; the Soul Orb just blasted them to insane 
levels.  The boost will be lost the moment she loses the Orb (as I had 
intended to begin with).

I do have a slight beef with the "no mind control" clause: besides 
making for an excellent sub-story as the victim struggles against his 
or her controller, such a precaution is largely unnecessary with the 
power-draining effect implemented in other sections of the ruling.  
The constant battle and resulting power requirements would 
automatically force such an effect to be short-term in nature - 
probably a maximum time frame measured in hours.  (Single-digit at 
that.)

And another thing, largely unrelated to the ruling: For the UMPTEEN 
MILLIONTH TIME, the Soul Orbs affect different bots in different ways. 
 Empath got her telepathic powers increased because that was her 
defining characteristic.  PLEASE quit assuming that anyone else would 
have that exact reaction!  Phoenix, for one, if and when she comes in 
contact with one of these condensed balls of Vok souls (which is what 
they are), will have a completely different fate.
